## Limpando o banco

```{r, limpa_banco, echo = T}

rm(list = ls())

```


## Carregando o pacote tidyverse

```{r, pacotes, echo = T}

if(!require(tidyverse)) {
  install.packages("tidyverse", dependencies = T); 
  require(tidyverse)
}


if(!require(knitr)) {
  install.packages("knitr", dependencies = T); 
  require(knitr)
}


if(!require(rmarkdown)) {
  install.packages("rmarkdown", dependencies = T); 
  require(rmarkdown)
}


```


## Definindo o set.seed (semente)

```{r, seed, echo = T}

set.seed(12345)

```


## Questão 1

### Questão 1.1

```{r, funcaoq11, echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE}

funcaoq11 <- function(x){
  
  valor <- x^2 - 5*x + 6
  
  return(valor)
  
}


runif(n = 100, min = 0, max = 4) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  mutate(y = seq_along(map(.x = value, .f = funcaoq11))) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = y, y = value)) +
  theme_bw()


```
